title: Q3 - Can an Indian company freely transfer anonymized data abroad?
description: - Yes. Anonymized data, which cannot identify an individual, is not treated as personal data under DPDPA.

previous.title: Q2 - What happens when Indian law conflicts with foreign privacy laws (like GDPR or CCPA)?

next.title: Q4 - Can Indian companies continue to use global cloud service providers (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)?
